title: cacheGet
name: cacheGet
description: Gets an object that is stored in the cache.

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: name of the element to return

arguments.name: throwWhenNotExist
arguments.description: define if the functions throws a exception when the element does not exist (default is false).

arguments.name: cacheName
arguments.description: definition of the cache used by name, when not set the "default Object Cache" defined in Lucee Administrator is used instead.
